snippet: Now that the trial has ended, John Edwards’s family, the jurors and others are moving on, but there is still a chance that the case will be pursued further.
abstract: Participants in the trial of John Edwards are all moving on, although there is still a chance that the case will be pursued further; Edwards himself has not granted any interviews, but his mistress Rielle Hunter is set to release a memoir called What Really Happened: John Edwards, Our Daughter, and Me.

byline.original: By KIM SEVERSON and JOHN SCHWARTZ

lead_paragraph: Now that the trial has ended, John Edwards’s family, the jurors and others are moving on, but there is still a chance that the case will be pursued further.

headline.seo: After John Edwards Case, Much Returns to Normal
headline.main: After Edwards Trial, Much Returns to Normal, but Not All Is Set
headline.print_headline: After Edwards Trial, Much Returns to Normal, but Not All Is Set
